images.imageCaption: Inline CSS modifying a single element
External CSS uses a separate file
Internal CSS is written in the HTML file

css.imageCaption: The Box Model is an excellent way of designing the layout of a webpage
Here is a helpful image to learn every text property for CSS! These help you modify your text to be exactly how you want it to look.

Something with a fixed layout will not adjust the size of things to fit them on your screen. It's like you are holding a blanket with a hole cut out of it over your webpage. You can only see through that hole. A fluid webpage will change and contort itself to fit all your info on the screen.

tips.title: Basic css
tips.description: Did you know that you can style CSS in the HTML file?
